description:
Title: Marketing Data Scientist

Duration: 11 Months

Location: Bellevue, WA

Pay Range: $60 to $66/hr

Responsibilities:
• Collaborate with the Data Analytics team to establish and refine a customer segmentation work stream.
• Utilize your expertise in analyzing and interpreting data from various sources such as Redshift, Oracle, and NoSQL databases.
• Apply data science methodologies to extract actionable insights relevant to marketing objectives.
• Develop and present recommendations for new metrics to enhance business performance understanding.
• Employ SQL for data extraction and Python for data processing and modeling.
• Utilize data visualization tools such as Tableau or Quicksight to communicate findings effectively.
• Apply forecasting and statistical analysis techniques to predict customer behavior and trends.
